Title: Binding from Five Poems (Quintet)
Dimensions: Folio H: 9 1/16 x W: 6 5/16 in. (23 x 16 cm)
Description: This non-original binding from Walters manuscript W.605 probably dates to the12th century AH/AD 18th. The binding is composed of brown leather (with a flap), and has stamped, gold-brushed central ovals, pendants, and cornerpieces. The binding has marbled endpapers. The first and last folios are mounted.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Ornament; Iran; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Anonymous
